forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. Southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 2am. Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 42. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
